violations: Missing PPE: Several workers are not wearing hard hats or high-visibility vests.

Blocked pathways: Floor area cluttered with materials.

Install proper guards on all machinery to prevent accidents.
Organize tools and materials to clear pathways and maintain a safe working environment.
